articles.author: NATO
articles.title: News: NATO launches “Eastern Sentry” to bolster posture along eastern flank, 12-Sep.-2025 - NATO
articles.description: On Friday (12 September 2025), NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte and Supreme Allied Commander Europe (SACEUR) General Alexus G. Grynkewich held a joint press conference to outline NATO’s response to the violation of Polish airspace by Russian drones two days …
articles.content: Commencing in the coming days, Eastern Sentry will involve a range of Allied assets and feature both traditional capabilities and novel technologies, including elements designed to address challenges… [+1534 chars]
